evidence_example.title: CAN demo
evidence_example.small_descr: CAN communication on FLEX + Multibus daughter board.
evidence_example.long_descr: Two sets of FLEX Full board + Multibus Daughter board + CAN module. RS232 module on UART1 slot for CAN Receiver. For other info see: http://erika.tuxfamily.org/wiki/index.php?title=FLEX_Multibus_Daughter_Board
